sentences.en: Halim flashed his official card, and managed to get hold of a soldier to guard the Land Rover.
sentences.cn: 哈利姆亮了一下他的军官证，设法找来了一名士兵看着路虎车。

sentences.en: He saw the grey Land-Rover down the by-pass. It was more than a hundred yards from him.
sentences.cn: 他看见那辆灰色的路虎越野车停在不远处的边道上，离他一百码开外。

sentences.en: I ran a 1960 Rover 100 from 1977 until 1983.
sentences.cn: 我从1977年到1983年一直开着一辆1960年产的罗孚100。

sentences.en: I'll look in the Rover and see if I can find anything for you.
sentences.cn: 我去吉普车里找一找,看看能不能为你找到些什么.

sentences.en: In 1986 Rover made a loss of nine hundred million pounds.
It's staring at Rover with fear and shaking like a leaf.
sentences.cn: 它正惊恐地盯着狗儿来福,并且抖得很厉害.

sentences.en: Mandi: Why is your dog Rover whining at you?
sentences.cn: 曼迪: 你的狗罗弗为甚麽向著你呜呜叫?

sentences.en: Photoptic Edition uses nylon resin adhesive, you can use the Rover, essence.
sentences.cn: 树脂版使用尼龙感光胶, 可以用洒精来显影.

sentences.en: Ralph the Rover was walking on the deck.
sentences.cn: 海盗拉尔夫在甲板上走动着.

sentences.en: Rover said, Don't pull on the dog's tail. It's dangerous.
sentences.cn: 罗维说, “ 不要拉狗的尾巴. 那样做是很危险的. ”

sentences.en: The engine is also available in the Range Rover Sport.
sentences.cn: 揽胜运动版也采用这款发动机.

sentences.en: The girl was scared by the rover on the street.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩被街上的流浪汉吓坏了.

sentences.en: The Indian of the West is a rover of the plain.
sentences.cn: 西部的印第安人在大平原上过着游牧生活.

sentences.en: While based on the Range Rover, the Discovery all new it matters.
sentences.cn: 发现在揽胜的基础上更新了其重点的部分.
